sentences.native: 劳累死的人，忧虑死的人，无聊死的人。

sentences.en: It is no use offering the manual labourer,
sentences.native: 提供体力劳动是没有用的，

sentences.en: tired out with a hard week's sweat and effort the chance of playing a game of football or baseball on Saturday afternoon.
sentences.native: 经过一周辛苦的汗水和努力，周六下午有机会踢一场足球或棒球比赛。

sentences.en: It is no use inviting the politician or the professional or business man, who has been working or worrying about serious things for six days,
sentences.native: 邀请政治家、专业人士或商人是没有用的，他们已经工作或担心了六天的严肃事情，

sentences.en: to work or worry about trifling things at the weekend.
sentences.native: 周末去工作或担心一些琐事。

sentences.en: As for the unfortunate people who can command everything they want,
sentences.native: 至于那些可以随心所欲地指挥一切的不幸的人，

sentences.en: who can gratify every caprice and lay their hands on almost every object of desire--for them a new pleasure a new excitement is only an additional satiation.
sentences.native: 他们能够满足每一个任性的想法，并且能够满足几乎每一个欲望的对象——对他们来说，新的快乐、新的兴奋只是一种额外的满足。

sentences.en: In vain they rush frantically round from place to place, trying to escape from avenging boredom by mere clatter and motion.
sentences.native: 他们徒劳地疯狂地从一个地方跑到另一个地方，试图仅仅通过叮当声和动作来摆脱无聊的报复。

sentences.en: For them discipline in one form or another is the most hopeful path.
sentences.native: 对他们来说，某种形式的纪律是最有希望的道路。

sentences.en: It may also be said that rational, industrious, useful human beings are divided into two classes:
sentences.native: 也可以说，理性、勤奋、有用的人分为两类：

sentences.en: first, those whose work is work and whose pleasure is pleasure;
sentences.native: 第一，工作就是工作，快乐就是快乐；

sentences.en: and secondly, those whose work and pleasure are one.
sentences.native: 其次，那些工作与娱乐合二为一的人。

sentences.en: Of these the former are the majority. They have their compensations.
sentences.native: 其中，前者占大多数。他们有他们的补偿。

sentences.en: The long hours in the office or the factory bring with them as their reward,
sentences.native: 在办公室或工厂长时间工作给他们带来的回报是，

sentences.en: not only the means of sustenance, but a keen appetite for pleasure even in its simplest and most modest forms.
sentences.native: 不仅是谋生手段，而且是对快乐的强烈渴望，即使是最简单、最朴素的形式。

sentences.en: But Fortune's favoured children belong to the second class.
sentences.native: 但命运眷顾的孩子却属于第二等。

sentences.en: Their life is a natural harmony.
sentences.native: 他们的生活是自然和谐的。

sentences.en: For them the working hours are never long enough.
sentences.native: 对他们来说，工作时间永远不够长。

sentences.en: Each day is a holiday, and ordinary holidays, when they come, are grudged as enforced interruptions in an absorbing vocation.
sentences.native: 每天都是假期，而普通的假期一旦到来，就会被视为强行打断令人着迷的职业而感到不情愿。

sentences.en: Yet to both classes, the need of an alternative outlook, of a change of atmosphere of a diversion of effort, is essential.
sentences.native: 然而，对于这两个阶级来说，需要另一种观点、改变气氛或转移精力，这是至关重要的。

sentences.en: Indeed, it may well be that those whose work is their pleasure are those who most need the means of banishing it at intervals from their minds.
sentences.native: 事实上，那些以工作为乐的人很可能最需要时不时地把工作从自己的脑海中驱逐出去的人。

sentences.en: Economy is one powerful motive for camping,
sentences.native: 经济是露营的强大动力之一，

sentences.en: since after the initial outlay upon equipment, or through hiring it, the total expense can be far less than the cost of hotels.
sentences.native: 因为在设备上或通过租用设备的初始费用之后，总费用可能远远低于酒店的费用。

sentences.en: But, contrary to a popular assumption, it is far from being the only one, or even the greatest.
sentences.native: 但是，与流行的假设相反，它远不是唯一的，甚至不是最伟大的。

sentences.en: The man who manoeuvres carelessly into his 20 pounds' worth of space at one of Europe's myriad permanent sites may find himself bumping a Bentley.
sentences.native: 一个人如果不小心进入欧洲无数永久地点之一的 20 磅重的空间，可能会发现自己撞上了一辆宾利车。

sentences.en: More likely, Ford Escort will be hub to hub with Renault or Mercedes, but rarely with bicycles made for two.
sentences.native: 更有可能的是，福特护航将与雷诺或梅赛德斯建立枢纽对枢纽，但很少与两人合作的自行车。

sentences.en: That the equipment of modern camping becomes yearly more sophisticated is an entertaining paradox for the cynic,
sentences.native: 对于愤世嫉俗的人来说，现代露营的设备每年都变得更加先进，这是一个有趣的悖论，

sentences.en: a brighter promise for the hopeful traveller who has sworn to get away from it all.
sentences.native: 对于那些发誓要摆脱这一切的满怀希望的旅行者来说，这是一个更光明的承诺。

sentences.en: It also provides--and some student sociologist might care to base his thesis upon the phenomenon--an escape of another kind.
sentences.native: 它还提供了另一种逃避方式——一些学生社会学家可能愿意将他的论文建立在这种现象的基础上。

sentences.en: The modern traveller is often a man who dislikes the Splendide and the Bellavista,
sentences.native: 现代旅行者通常是不喜欢辉煌和贝拉维斯塔的人，

sentences.en: not because he cannot afford, or shuns their material comforts, but because he is afraid of them.
sentences.native: 不是因为他负担不起或回避他们的物质享受，而是因为他害怕他们。

sentences.en: Affluent he may be, but he is by no means sure what to tip the doorman or the chambermaid.
sentences.native: 他可能很富有，但他决不知道该给门童或女服务员多少小费。

sentences.en: Master in his own house he has little idea of when to say boo to a manager hotel.
sentences.native: 主人在自己家里，他不知道什么时候该对酒店经理说嘘。

sentences.en: From all such fears camping releases him.
sentences.native: 露营让他摆脱了所有这些恐惧。

sentences.en: Granted, a snobbery of camping itself, based upon equipment and techniques, already exists;
sentences.native: 诚然，基于装备和技术的露营本身已经存在一种势利。

sentences.en: but it is of a kind that, if he meets it, he can readily understand and deal with.
sentences.native: 但这是一种如果他遇到了，他就能轻易理解和处理的事情。

sentences.en: There is no superior 'they' in the shape of managements and hotel hierarchies to darken his holiday days.
sentences.native: 管理层和酒店等级制度中没有高级的“他们”让他的假期变得黯淡。

sentences.en: To such motives, yet another must be added.
sentences.native: 除了这些动机之外，还必须加上另一个动机。

sentences.en: The contemporary phenomenon of car worship is to be explained not least by the sense of independence and freedom that ownership entails.
sentences.native: 当代汽车崇拜现象的一个重要原因是拥有权所带来的独立和自由感。

sentences.en: To this pleasure camping gives an exquisite refinement.
sentences.native: 露营给这种乐趣带来了精致的享受。

sentences.en: From one's own front door to home or foreign hills or sands and back again, everything is to hand.
sentences.native: 从自己的前门到家乡或外国的山丘或沙滩，然后再返回，一切都在手边。

sentences.en: Not only are the means of arriving at the holiday paradise entirely within one's own command and keeping,
sentences.native: 不仅到达度假天堂的手段完全在自己的掌握和掌控之中，

sentences.en: but the means of escape from holiday hell (if the beach proves too crowded, the local weather too inclement)
sentences.native: 但逃离假期地狱的方法（如果海滩太拥挤，当地天气太恶劣）

sentences.en: are there, outside--or, as likely, part of--the tent.
sentences.native: 在那里，在帐篷外面——或者很可能是帐篷的一部分。

sentences.en: Idealists have objected to the practice of camping, as to the package tour,
sentences.native: 理想主义者反对露营的做法，至于跟团旅游，

sentences.en: that the traveller abroad thereby denies himself the opportunity of getting to know the people of the country visited.
sentences.native: 出国旅行的人因此而失去了了解该国人民的机会。

sentences.en: Insularity and self-containment, it is argued, go hand in hand.
sentences.native: 有人认为，孤立性和自我封闭是相辅相成的。

sentences.en: The opinion does not survive experience of a popular Continental camping place.
sentences.native: 这种观点并不适用于流行的大陆露营地的体验。

sentences.en: Holiday hotels tend to cater for one nationality of visitors especially, sometimes exclusively.
sentences.native: 度假酒店往往专门为某一国籍的游客提供服务，有时甚至专门针对某一国籍的游客。

sentences.en: Camping sites, by contrast, are highly cosmopolitan.
sentences.native: 相比之下，露营地则高度国际化。

sentences.en: Granted, a preponderance of Germans is a characteristic that seems common to most Mediterranean sites;
sentences.native: 诚然，德国人占多数是大多数地中海地区的共同特征。

sentences.en: but as yet there is no overwhelmingly specialized patronage.
sentences.native: 但迄今为止还没有压倒性的专门赞助。

sentences.en: Notices forbidding the open-air drying of clothes,
sentences.native: 禁止露天晾晒衣物的告示，

sentences.en: or the use of water points for car washing,
sentences.native: 或使用水点洗车，

sentences.en: or those inviting 'our camping friends' to a dance or a boat trip are printed not only in French or Italian or Spanish, but also in English, German and Dutch.
sentences.native: 或者那些邀请“我们的露营朋友”参加舞会或乘船旅行的邀请函不仅用法语、意大利语或西班牙语打印，而且还用英语、德语和荷兰语打印。

sentences.en: At meal times the odour of sauerkraut vies with that of garlic.
sentences.native: 吃饭的时候，酸菜的气味和大蒜的气味相互竞争。

sentences.en: The Frenchman's breakfast coffee competes with the Englishman's bacon and eggs.
sentences.native: 法国人的早餐咖啡与英国人的培根和鸡蛋竞争。

sentences.en: Whether the remarkable growth of organized camping means the eventual death of the more independent kind is hard to say.
sentences.native: 很难说有组织的露营活动的显着增长是否意味着更独立的露营活动的最终消亡。

sentences.en: Municipalities naturally want to secure the campers' site fees and other custom.
sentences.native: 市政当局自然希望确保露营者的场地费和其他习俗。

sentences.en: Police are wary of itinerants who cannot be traced to a recognized camp boundary or to four walls.
sentences.native: 警方对无法追踪到公认的营地边界或四堵墙的流动人员保持警惕。

sentences.en: But most probably it will all depend upon campers themselves: how many heath fires they cause; how much litter they leave;
sentences.native: 但很可能这一切都取决于露营者自己：他们引起了多少荒野火灾；他们留下了多少垃圾；

sentences.en: in short, whether or not they wholly alienate landowners and those who live in the countryside.
sentences.native: 简而言之，他们是否完全疏远了土地所有者和农村居民。

sentences.en: Only good scouting is likely to preserve the freedoms so dear to the heart of the eternal Boy Scout.
sentences.native: 只有良好的童子军才能维护永恒童子军心中所珍视的自由。

sentences.en: There is no shortage of tipsters around offering 'get-rich-quick' opportunities.
sentences.native: 围绕提供“快速致富”机会的消息人士并不缺乏。

sentences.en: But if you are a serious private investor, leave the Las Vegas mentality to those with money to fritter.
sentences.native: 但如果你是一位严肃的私人投资者，那就把拉斯维加斯的心态留给那些有钱可以挥霍的人吧。

sentences.en: The serious investor needs a proper 'portfolio' --a well-planned selection of investments, with a definite structure and a clear aim.
sentences.native: 认真的投资者需要一个合适的“投资组合”——精心策划的投资选择，具有明确的结构和明确的目标。

sentences.en: But exactly how does a newcomer to the stock market go about achieving that?
sentences.native: 但股市新手究竟如何实现这一目标呢？

sentences.en: Well, if you go to five reputable stock brokers and ask them what you should do with your money,
sentences.native: 好吧，如果你去找五位信誉良好的股票经纪人，问他们你应该用你的钱做什么，

sentences.en: you're likely to get five different answers,
sentences.native: 你可能会得到五个不同的答案，

sentences.en: --  even if you give all the relevant information about your age, family, finances and what you want from your investments.
sentences.native: ——即使您提供了有关您的年龄、家庭、财务状况以及您希望从投资中获得什么的所有相关信息。

sentences.en: Moral? There is no one 'right' way to structure a portfolio.
sentences.native: 道德？没有一种“正确”的方法来构建投资组合。

sentences.en: However, there are undoubtedly some wrong ways, and you can be sure that none of our five advisers
sentences.native: 但是，无疑存在一些错误的方法，并且可以肯定的是，我们的五位顾问都没有

sentences.en: would have suggested sinking all (or perhaps any) of your money into Periwigs.
sentences.native: 会建议将你所有（或者可能是任何）的钱投入假发。

sentences.en: So what should you do?
sentences.native: 那么你应该做什么呢？

sentences.en: We'll assume that you have sorted out the basics--like mortgages, pensions, insurance and access to sufficient cash reserves.
sentences.native: 我们假设您已经解决了基本问题，例如抵押贷款、养老金、保险和获得足够的现金储备。

sentences.en: You should then establish your own individual aims.
sentences.native: 然后你应该建立自己的个人目标。

sentences.en: These are partly a matter of personal circumstances, partly a matter of psychology.
sentences.native: 这些部分是个人情况的问题，部分是心理问题。

sentences.en: For instance, if you are older you have less time to recover from any major losses, and you may well wish to boost your pension income.
sentences.native: 例如，如果您年龄较大，那么从重大损失中恢复过来的时间就会减少，您可能希望增加养老金收入。

sentences.en: So preserving your capital and generating extra income are your main priorities.
sentences.native: 因此，保护​​您的资本并创造额外收入是您的首要任务。

sentences.en: In this case, you'd probably construct a portfolio with some shares (but not high risk ones), along with gilts, cash deposits,
sentences.native: 在这种情况下，您可能会构建一个包含一些股票（但不是高风险股票）的投资组合，以及英国国债、现金存款、

sentences.en: and perhaps convertibles or the income shares of split capital investment trusts.
sentences.native: 也许还有可转换债券或分割资本投资信托的收入份额。

sentences.en: If you are younger, and in a solid financial position,
sentences.native: 如果你比较年轻，经济状况也不错，

sentences.en: you may decide to take an aggressive approach--but only if you're blessed with a sanguine disposition and won't suffer sleepless nights over share prices.
sentences.native: 你可能会决定采取积极的态度——但前提是你有乐观的性格并且不会因为股价而彻夜难眠。

sentences.en: If you recognize yourself in this description,
sentences.native: 如果您在这段描述中认出了自己，

sentences.en: you might include a couple of heady growth stocks in your portfolio, alongside your more pedestrian investments.
sentences.native: 你可能会在你的投资组合中加入几只令人兴奋的成长型股票，以及一些平淡无奇的投资。

sentences.en: Once you have decided on your investment aims you can then decide where to put your money.
sentences.native: 一旦您决定了投资目标，您就可以决定将资金投入何处。

sentences.en: The golden rule here is spread your risk--if you put all of your money into Periwigs International,
sentences.native: 这里的黄金法则是分散风险——如果你把所有的钱都投入 Periwigs International，

sentences.en: you're setting yourself up as a hostage to fortune.
sentences.native: 你正在把自己当作财富的人质。
